title: Whimsical whatnots and whodidits
description: Follow Maddie as book two opens the gate up wide to a magical world not seen by humans, but home to many new creatures. Maddie wakes to a new realization, just scratching the surface to who she is and where she came from. Will she find herself settling in? or will she once again feel out of step even in a world built to please her? Find out as this fun and fast paced YA continues to weave a tale of new worlds and incredible creatures. Appropriate for readers 12+ with aspects of magic, fantasy and light romantic overtones.
author: Rue Volley
